Celebrating WordPress plugins — on paperWordPress turns 20 in 2023 — happy birthday 🎉 Purchase a high-quality print version of the unique periodic table of WordPress plugins to celebrate the project's anniversary!The poster is available in both light and dark mode and you can even add a frame, too!Proceeds will be donated to the WordPress community. Shipping included. Learn more →Got any more questions? Drop me a note!



Twitter
